titles.title: A resolution congratulating the University of Akron men's soccer team on winning the National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Men's Soccer Championship.
A resolution congratulating the University of Akron men's soccer team on winning the National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Men's Soccer Championship.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Congratulates the University of Akron men's soccer team on winning the 2010 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Men's Soccer Championship.
Recognizes that university's athletic program for encouraging student-athletes to achieve in both sports and academics.
